entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
